definition: شجر šajara u (šajr) to happen, occur; to break out, develop (unrest) III to quarrel, argue, dispute (مع or ه with s.o.) VI to quarrel, fight, dispute (with one another); to quarrel, argue, fight (مع with) VIII do. شجر šajar (coll.; n. un. ة) pl. اشجار ašjār trees; shrubs, bushes شجر šajir woody, wooded, abounding in trees
